actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to exempt tax supported public educational institutions which offer vocational courses from placement record requirements as a prerequisite to approval by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text: Exempts specified State-approved and tax-supported vocational courses from placement record requirements as a prerequisite to approval by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 673(a)(2), 1723(a)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to exempt tax supported public educational institutions which offer vocational courses from placement record requirements as a prerequisite to approval by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
